problem_text: In \triangle J L P, m \angle J M P = 3 x - 6, J K = 3 y - 2, and L K = 5 y - 8. If J M is an altitude of \triangle J L P, find x.
compact_text: In \triangle JLP, m \angle JMP = 3x-6, JK = 3y-2, and LK = 5y-8. If JM is an altitude of \triangle JLP, find x.
annotat_text: In $\triangle JLP$, $m \angle JMP=3 x-6$, $JK=3y-2$, and $LK=5y-8$. If $\overline{JM}$ is an altitude of $\triangle JLP$, find $x$.
